messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hey, 10, he's running from Argonne, 1522 Argonne running back towards you guys.
Where exactly is he now?
He was at a house, 1522 Argonne. Unknown location right now. He had his back towards me. Unable to tell if he had a weapon or not.
Do not pursue him by yourself. Set up a perimeter.
Roger that. He's cutting through the wood line, heading back towards the road that leads to Argonne.
Understood. Keep the perimeter contained. A K9 unit should be arriving shortly.
Copy, I can't confirm if he has a weapon, only saw his back.
We have officers behind the residence at 1522 Argonne. What do you see?
Shots fired! Officer down, officer down!
Officer down at 1522 Argonne. We need all available units here, ASAP.
We can't get to him. We don't know where the suspect is.
Alright, I need someone on foot. Fire and EMS are on standby.
We need a medic. Officer has a shotgun wound.
Medics are en route. What's the officer's location?
He's at 1522 Argonne. What about the suspect?
Move the officer to a safe location. Suspect last seen on Argonne moving towards Ruby.
He's back on Argonne, heading towards Ruby.
We're taking heavy fire. We need reinforcements.
Units, assist with heavy fire at 1509 Argonne. Suspect is there.
We need more units at 1509 Argonne.
EMS, approach on Ruby Road to Argonne.
Medics, we have a wounded officer here at the bottom of the hill.
Units, hold your positions. EMS is on the way.
We have civilians assisting with the officer but they are limited.
Medics, enter from Ruby Road to Argonne. Move cautiously.
Suspect is still behind 1509 Argonne. We are holding perimeter.
Units, reinforce perimeter at 1509 Argonne. Suspect is behind the house.
We need EMS at Ruby and Amber.
EMS, proceed to Ruby and Amber.
We have detained two in front of 1509 and a vehicle attempting to leave.
Confirm the vehicle and detain all occupants. Suspect could still be inside.
Suspect last seen in the back room of 1509 Argonne.
All units, maintain cover and hold perimeter. Await further orders.
We need medics for a male with shotgun wound to the leg.
Medics, proceed to Ruby and Argonne.
We're evacuating nearby houses.
All units, assist with evacuation while maintaining perimeter at 1509 Argonne.
